name: Stranded (itch) (everedx)
description:
DISCOVER AN UNKNOWN WORLD

After spending months in his ship, you will find yourself investigating a derelict ship that looks suspicious. There is no way this couldn't go wrong and you will end up stranded in a land that you don't belong to. Discover who's the tyrant that is terrorizing the population of an enslaved village. Is there any relationship between him and what happened to you? There is only one way to find out...

  • From a derelict ship in outer space to the depths of a suspicious monolith, explore the ten different areas of this world.
  • Fight your way through the enormous amount of different enemies. From mechanical foes to fierce soldiers and magical entities.
  • Recover the abilities that you had once, and find completely new ones.
  • Enjoy the beautiful handmade frame-by-frame pixel art animations.
  • Listen and let the music go through your body while you slice and dice your foes with the synth-wave rythm.
